courses.summary: Based on the presentation by Alex Martelli.
courses.description:
Based on the presentation by Alex Martelli. Course is released under Creative Commons BY-SA. Python 3 For:
  • mildly to very experienced programmers in 1 (or, better, more) of Java, C++, C, Perl, ...
  • no previous exposure to Python needed a little bit can't hurt
  • if you already know Python well, you will probably end up rather bored! -)
  • ready for some very fast & technical parts
  • as well as some more relaxed ones :-)
You will learn:
  • most aspects of Python programming language
  • many common ideoms
  • grasp of tools and libraries
Incomplete Russian translation is available here.
